title: SENIOR MANAGER - INSTRUCTIONAL DESIGN
tagsAndSkills: Training,digital content,articulate storyline,html5,Instructional design,Design development,Mentor,content designing

ambitionBoxData.Title: Cognigix Digital Learning Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• Demonstrate interdisciplinary knowledge, cross-cultural competency, and knowledge of instructional theories and models.
  • Apply learning theories and models in training design.
  • Demonstrate key competencies in and knowledge of working on K-12, higher education, or corporate projects.
  • Demonstrate the ability to create simple, clear, and concise content that is grammatically correct and instructionally effective.
  • Design curriculum, create training macro and micro designs, create training materials, and write functional specifications documents (FSD).
  • Demonstrate functional knowledge or understanding of tools such as Articulate Storyline and Captivate.
  • Demonstrate functional knowledge or understanding of HTML5 with regard to training design and development.
  • Demonstrate functional knowledge or understanding of programs and tools such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, and Vyond with regard to training design and development.
  • Conduct needs assessment.
  • Design and develop diverse solutions such as courses, games, animations, live action videos, and assessments and demonstrate knowledge of functionality, design, navigation, etc.
  • Collaborate with our multi-stakeholder team and work with them in the development of diverse solutions.
  • Develop the right instructional strategy and the appropriate structure, with activities, presentations, learner engagement approaches, practice drills, scenarios, case studies, and evaluations.
  • Develop and deliver targeted client projects.
  • Conduct project onboarding.
  • Create standards and guidelines for projects.
  • Review storyboards and builds and give constructive feedback to team members.
  • Mentor, coach, and shadow IDs.
  • Solve problems in projects and issues faced by IDs, if any.
  • Review the work and ascertain whether it meets clients expectations.
  • Ensure quality deliveries.
  • Demonstrate effective communication skills, people skills, and presentation skills.
  • Build close partnerships with clients.

title: QUALITY ANALYST MANAGER
tagsAndSkills: Graphics,Manual testing,Functional testing,Integration testing,Regression testing,Test cases,microsoft,MS Office

ambitionBoxData.Title: Cognigix Digital Learning Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
• Reasonably strong knowledge of testing disciplines and methodologies
  • Plan, execute, and oversee inspection and testing of incoming and outgoing product to confirm quality conformance to specifications and quality deliverables
  • Experience in the quality control of training, web-based training is an asset
  • Define and maintain test plans to create effective QA processes
  • Test technical functionality/compatibility across multiple browsers and platforms
  • Review text / graphics / audio / interactivity against original scripted content
  • Document quality assurance activities with internal reporting tool and audits
  • Analyze and investigate product complaints or reported quality issues to ensure closure in accordance with company guidelines and external regulatory requirements
  • Collaborate with the internal team (like Instructional Designers, Media teams) and Clients to seek clarification on the requirements
  • Ability to handle team and allocate tasks
  • Should be able to work on the multiple projects and able to prioritize

Job Specification

Experience

  • 5+ years of experience in Quality Assurance function along with experience in handling team.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of testing best practices, version control and defect management.
  • Create, Execute, Review Test Cases and test scenarios for E-Learning.
  • Experience in Manual Testing (Test case design, Test case execution, and collecting Test data).
  • Good knowledge of Testing Techniques, Types of Testing, Test Scenarios, and Test Cases.
  • Having ability to work in Team with individuals of different skill levels.
  • Expertise in Bug Tracking Process, Familiar with Bug Reporting and Tracking using Bug tracking Tools.
  • Experience in Functional Testing, Regression Testing, Re-Testing, E2E, Compatibility Testing, Browser Testing, Integration Testing, and also have knowledge about Scorm Cloud.
  • Experience in the usage of MS Office (specifically Word, Excel, and PowerPoint), Outlook Express, Microsoft Visual SourceSafe.

Projects Handled Quality Assurance for E-Learning Content and Functional Testing for E-Learning Modules.

Certifications Professional Testing certification

Qualification Bachelor s degree in software engineering or information technology

Language Proficiency Good written and spoken Englis

Skills Competency Attention to Details, Multi-tasking, Analytical Skills, Logical Reasoning, Result Oriented, Problem Solving, Interpersonal skills, Planning Organizing, Collaborative approach
